rules: Rule1: Either the sofa is damaged or the event is ongoing.
Rule2: Provided that player1 is ready, player1 is equipped.
Rule3: Under the condition that the game application is downloaded, if player1 is equipped then the event is ongoing.
Rule4: Either the game application is downloaded or the game application is installed.
Rule5: Whenever the game application is installed, provided that player1 is equipped, the event is ongoing.
Rule6: Provided that automation is enabled, if it is not the case that the event not being ongoing implies the security camera is not active, then motion is not detected.
Rule7: If automation is configured, then under the condition that the event not being ongoing does not imply the security camera is not active, motion is not detected.
Rule8: Either the region is monitored or if it is not true that either automation is enabled or automation is configured does not imply the alarm is triggered, then the admin is notified.
Rule9: Either the climate is optimized, or the thermostat is adjusted, or if the event is not ongoing, the lighting is activated.
Rule10: Under the condition that the temperature is stable, the climate is not optimized.
Rule11: Provided that the stream is running, the stream is interrupted.
Rule12: Either the stream is running or if the event is not ongoing, the tablet is powered.
Rule13: Provided that the moderator is active, the moderator is watching.
Rule14: Whenever the moderator is watching, the moderator is supervising.
Rule15: Provided that the tournament is scheduled, the tournament is planned.
Rule16: Either the tournament is scheduled or the tournament is canceled.
Rule17: Under the condition that the moderator is supervising, the moderator is available.
Rule18: Whenever the moderator is available, if the stream is running then the stream is not interrupted.
Rule19: If recording is enabled, then provided that the moderator is active, whenever the stream is running, the stream is not interrupted.
Rule20: Provided that the drone is active, the drone is flying.
Rule21: Either the drone is active or if recording is not enabled, footage is stored.
Rule22: Under the condition that footage is edited, footage is processed.
Rule23: Whenever the controller is charged, if the event is not ongoing, the tablet is powered.
Rule24: Either the controller is charged or the controller is connected.
Rule25: Provided that the tournament is canceled, the sofa is not damaged.
Rule26: Provided that the controller is connected, the controller is synced.
Rule27: Whenever the controller is synced, if the event is not ongoing, the tablet is powered.
Rule28: Under the condition that the tablet is functional, the tablet is powered.
Rule29: Provided that the software is updated, if the event is not ongoing, the tablet is functional.
Rule30: Either the software is updated or the software is configured.
Rule31: If the software is configured, then whenever the event is not ongoing, the tablet is functional.
Rule32: Provided that the speakers are set up, the speakers are connected.
Rule33: Under the condition that the speakers are connected, if the tournament is planned then the projector is available.
Rule34: If player1 is registered, then player1 is confirmed.
Rule35: Whenever player1 is confirmed, player1 is ready.
Rule36: Under the condition that it is not true that either automation is enabled or automation is configured, the alarm is not triggered.
Rule37: Whenever it is not true that the drone being active implies it is not flying not leading to aerial footage is captured, footage is edited.
Rule38: Provided that the event not being ongoing does not imply the security camera is not active, motion is detected.
Rule39: Provided that recording is not enabled, footage is not stored.
Rule40: Under the condition that the event is not ongoing, the security camera is active.
Rule41: Provided that the event is not ongoing, the lighting is not activated.
facts: Fact3: The speakers are set up.
Fact5: The admin is not notified.
Fact6: The projector is not available.
Fact7: The region is not monitored.
Fact8: The thermostat is not adjusted.
Fact9: The tablet is not powered.
Fact10: Aerial footage is not captured.
